name: LuckToOpen
description:
LUCK TO OPEN “Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.” INTRODUCTION

In This Game Made For Nes Game Jam 2020 In Few Days.

Theme : Based On Luck.

All Art and Programming By Me.

Game Instructions

• You Can Only Win This Game ,If You Have 100% Luck.

• All The End Of The Room You will Select One Door Among Three Doors But Only One Door is Real. If You Selected Wrong Door The Game is Over.

• Kill All Enemies Then Only You Can Open Door.

Controls

• W ,A, S and D To Move Up,Left,Down,Right.

• Press "Enter" To Open Door.

• LeftClick To Shoot Bullets.

• Press "P" To Change Bullets.

SUPPORT ❤

•  My Youtube Channel : Subscribe

GOOD LUCK GUYS👍

DEVELOPED BY ETERNALIAN STUDIOS
